articles.title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic PS5 remake development on hold
articles.description: The remake of Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic for PlayStation 5 has been put on indefinite hold by developer Aspyr, Bloomberg reports.
articles.content: Developer Aspyrs remake of fan-favorite Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic for PlayStation 5 has been delayed indefinitely, according to a report from Bloomberg. The news comes after the studio r… [+1124 chars]

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Xbox launches camping gear collection
articles.description: Xbox launched a new line of camping-themed products. Fans can get their hands on a line of Xbox-inspired camping gear like hammocks, lawn chairs, clothing, and more.
articles.content: Its summer and its a particularly hot one. During the most sweltering of days, its well-advised to stay out of the sun and play your favorite video games from the safety of your windowless basement. … [+1012 chars]

articles.title: The Sims 4 patch notes: New update preps for High School Years expansion
articles.description: Electronic Arts’ new The Sims 4 expansion pack is out Thursday, but ahead of the release date, The Sims 4 has a new, free base game update. Here’s what’s new and included in the patch notes.
articles.content:
The Sims 4 got a major base game update on Tuesday ahead of the High School Years expansion pack launching Thursday. The patch is out now, and free for everyone.
Your Sims wont be able to attend Cop… [+2962 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Avengers: The Kang Dynasty to be directed by Shang-Chi’s director
articles.description: The next Avengers movie, The Kang Dynasty, will be directed by Destin Daniel Cretton, who directed Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings. Avengers: The Kang Dynasty, and its sequel Avengers: Secret Wars, will close Marvel’s Phase 6 in 2025.
articles.content: The latest movies in the Avengers saga were only announced last weekend during Marvels San Diego Comic-Con panel, but the first has already found a director. Avengers: The Kang Dynasty will be direct… [+1430 chars]

articles.title: MultiVersus patch notes want you to know that Taz is too powerful
articles.description: MultiVersus, the Super Smash Bros style fighting game starring Batman, Superman, Arya Stark from Game of Thrones, and lots of other Warner Bros. characters, has some extremely funny patch notes.
articles.content: Patch notes the logs of changes developers make in each update of a game are often very funny. Sometimes this is on purpose, as a way to spice up very dry and technical information. But other times, … [+1997 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Meta Quest 2 VR headsets are going up in price by $100
articles.description: Meta’s VR headset, the Quest 2, is getting a price increase. Starting in August, the price of a Quest 2 will go up $100: $399 for the 128 GB model, $499 for the 256 GB model.
articles.content: In perhaps the most surprising tech news in recent memory, Meta announced Tuesday that the company is adjusting prices on its flagship Quest 2 virtual reality headsets not to lower the price of the n… [+1623 chars]

articles.title: Let the Right One In trailer: A new take on the bestseller about child vampirism
articles.description: The first trailer for Showtime’s Let the Right One In series once again focuses on a young girl vampire, her adult protector, and her loneliness. It keeps the melancholy from the book and movies, but adds explosions. Debuting Oct. 9, with a streaming preview …

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Netflix announces The Gray Man sequel and spinoff
articles.description: Netflix announced Anthony and Joe Russo will return with a sequel to their action movie The Gray Man. Star Ryan Gosling will also return, and the film will be accompanied by a spin-off with a script by the writers of Deadpool.
articles.content: From the Russo Brothers lips, to Netflixs ears: The Gray Man is getting a sequel. As the directing pair frequently stated in interviews, The Gray Man was meant to be a franchise, kindling for sequels… [+1097 chars]
